metadata.title: jenkins-2-plugins: dimensionsscm: Missing permission check in Dimensions Plugin allows enumerating credentials IDs (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: 
A potential vulnerability has been identified in the Micro Focus Dimensions CM Plugin for Jenkins. The vulnerability allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.
See the following Jenkins security advisory for details:  *   https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2023-06-14/ https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2023-06-14/ 




 
            STATEMENT: The Jenkins Dimensions Plugin is not shipped in any of the Red Hat products. Hence, closing as not a bug.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
